summary: Three middle-aged wealthy couples take vacations together in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. Along the way we are treated to mid-life, marital, parental and other crises.
cast: Alan Alda|Carol Burnett|Len Cariou|Sandy Dennis|Rita Moreno|Jack Weston|Bess Armstrong|Elizabeth Alda|Beatrice Alda|Robert Hitt|Kristi McCarthy|David Stackpole
title: Las cuatro estaciones
